favourite.article: Everything's the best that it could be... So let's gain Christ!
Not just doctrines and theology, but the content of reality: Christ as everything in you and me, Heâ€™s everything to us! Saints, just keep gaining Christ!!

Recently I have been seeing some "gaps" in my life. Then the Lord has been showing me that these are "opportunities" to take Him. I was reminded of this song. So many of its lines are invitations to come forward and receive Him as grace.

I love this hymn because the words touch me, like most other hymns, but when I go over the lyrics in this one, I am reminded of many things such as how marvelous our Christ is, and also how we must let the Spirit work in us!
